text: Montceau-les-Mines is a commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Saône-et-Loire department in east France. == Twin towns == Montceau-les-Mines is twinned with: * Geislingen an der Steige, Germany * Żory, Poland == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Communes in Saône-et-Loire
title: Montceau-les-Mines
